com.mafiagame.csci3308.mafiagame

Class OpeningView

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurfaceView
      • com.mafiagame.csci3308.mafiagame.OpeningView

  • public class OpeningView
extends SurfaceView
    This is the Opening class. It implements SurfaceHolder and OnClickListener to hold the picture position and end the welcome part.
    Author:
    Qi Pei
